summary: This mod has several different pets that well follow you.
descriptionHtml:
OK so there are still some bugs to be worked out it is a work in progress I well update it often. I have put this up for testing if you find any thing let me know. You can have a reg Follower with one of these pets. Also to note there is no key to hideaway right now it is under construction. This animals can be found on the hill to the right next to riverwood I well have a video out shortly to show how to get to them. I hope you all enjoy. 

---------------------------------------------Update 1.1---------------------------------------------------

So I add a few more pets.

1. skeever
2. deer
3. fox
4. mudcrab

I did some light fixes and add some weapon racks. Also the mannequins should stop moving. My main goal was to add some more pets. More stuff in later updates. 

--------------------------------------Update 1.2
Ok so you can now go into hideaway there are something I am working on if you find stuff that is wrong in hide away let me know.

1. I add some new followers black smith in hideaway and merchant.

2. I add 3 new pet followers
Hare-- Note the hare well not fight it well just follow also hare is just for fun
Ice wolf
Spectral dog

All 3 new pets are in hide away i well be doing more with the hideaway at a later date I have more stuff coming later on so I hope you all enjoy. Let me know what you all think about hideaway.
author: Stubby
